A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
TERRIBLE!

I never thought a Star Wars movie ccould be so bad. Even Episode 1 is 10000000 time better than this 152 minutes waste of time!

This film has such a bad plot that even a primary school student could have written a better one. The situation ist the same as in Episode 5: the rebels(Resistance) try to escape from the empire(First Order). Also this film includes many disturbing and unnecessary characters like Rose or "Purple Hair Lady" (I didn´t care enough to remember her name). Their decisions made absolutly no sense and made the whole situation even worse! I also have a large problem with Luke\, not because he changed his character completely\, but because the film failed in giving comprehensibly reasons for his changes. But the worst aspect of this film ist that it spents nearly 30 minutes in criticize capitalism. Even Star Wars is now infected by the SJW-Virus.

I honestly cannot understand why this film has a rating of 90%.The only good thing of this film are the visiual effects.

Disney and Rian Johnson actually did someting what I always thought to be impossible-they destroyed the Star Wars franchise!
